title: Laura Dern wows in semi-sheer red velvet dress as she joins a a leggy Anna Paquin at event
text:
They are critically acclaimed actresses with an eye for style.

And Laura Dern and Anna Paquin looked sensational as they headed to the star-studded Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences New Members Event in London on Saturday.

Laura, 52, and Anna, 37, wowed in their stylish ensembles as they headed to the event.

Wow: Laura Dern and Anna Paquin looked sensational as they headed to the star-studded Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences New Members Event in London on Saturday

Two time Oscar nominee Laura wowed in a scarlet velvet dress with racy semi-sheer black panels as she arrived.

The dress cinched in at her slender waist and flowed into a voluminous skirt, with the star completing the look with black leather boots.

Her tresses were styled in loose waves while her pretty features were enhanced with a radiant palette of make-up.

Anna, who won the Best Supporting Actress Oscar for The Piano in 1994, flaunted her toned legs in a plunging black blazer dress paired with diamante stilettos.

Chic: Two time Oscar nominee Laura wowed in a scarlet velvet dress with racy semi-sheer black panels as she arrived

Glamour: The dress cinched in at her slender waist and flowed into a voluminous skirt, with the star completing the look with black leather boots

The dress was adorned with silver buttons and teased a glimpse of her decolletage.

Her locks were styled in tousled waves with the star accessorising with diamond earrings.

She attended with husband Stephen Moyer, 49, who looked dapper in a black suit.

The event featured A-list royalty with Ray Liotta, Taron Egerton and Jamie Bell in attendance.

Laura is starring in Marriage Story, which will be released in theaters and stream on Netflix later this year, is the story of 'a marriage breaking up and a family staying together,' according to the movie's page on Netflix's site.

Wow: Anna, who won the Best Supporting Actress Oscar for The Piano in 1994, flaunted her toned legs in a plunging black blazer dress paired with diamante stilettos

Chic: She attended with husband Stephen Moyer, 49, who looked dapper in a black suit

Iconic: Willem Dafoe looked dapper in a navy suit as he posed up

Smart: George Mackay looked delighted to be at the glitzy event

Proud: Ray Liotta attended the event with his daughter Karsen, 20

Acclaimed: Dexter Fletcher paired his smart look with trainers

While Johansson plays one half of the divorcing couple and Dern presumably plays her lawyer, the role of the husband is played by another high profile actor from a huge tentpole franchise: Star Wars' Adam Driver.

Universal Pictures has reportedly convinced all three original Jurassic Park stars - Jeff Goldblum, Laura Dern, and Sam Neill - to return for Jurassic World 3.

If Deadline's sources are right, it'll be the first time the three actors reunite onscreen since Steven Spielberg's iconic, critically-lauded 1993 original.

Jurassic World director Colin Trevorrow is helming the Spielberg-produced 2021 installment, which begins production at England's Pinewood Studios next spring.

Jeff last reprised his role as chaotician Dr. Ian Malcolm in Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom (2018) and The Lost World: Jurassic Park (1997) as well as video games Evolution (2018) and Chaos Island (1997).

Sharp: David Heyman looked handsome as he posed up at the event

Rocketmen! Rocketman stars Taron Egerton and Jamie Bell posed up

While Laura and Sam only reprised their onscreen couple Dr. Ellie Sattler and Dr. Alan Grant in Joe Johnston's forgettable three-quel Jurassic Park III back in 2001.

Trevorrow is clearly trying to recapture some of the magic from Jurassic Park, which amassed an eye-popping $5B (including video games, toys, novels, animated LEGO series and theme park attractions.)

Style: Greta Gerwig looked gorgeous in a leather dress as she posed
description: Laura Dern and Anna Paquin looked sensational as they headed to the star-studded Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences New Members Event in London on Saturday.
